documentation.dc:subject: Agent-based simulation of classical bomberman game
Agentenbasierte Simulation des klassischen Bomberman Spiels
documentation.source: Most images are taken from the "Bombermaaan" game developed by the "Bombermaaan project" (http://bombermaaan.sourceforge.net/).
documentation.aors:shortDescription: A reconstruction of the classical Bomberman game originally published in 1983 by Hudson Soft".
Eine Rekonstruktion des klassischen Bomberman Spiels, welches ursprünglich im Jahre 1983 von Hudson Soft entwickelt wurde.

aors:description.p: In this game 5 bombermans are fighting against each other. One of them is controlled by the user. Target for every bomberman is to eliminate every opponent by smart placing of bombs. Abilities of the agents and probabilities to win could be improved by collecting items.

In diesem Spiel treten 5 Bombermans gegeneinander an, wobei einer von diesen von einem Menschen gesteuert wird. Ziel eines jeden Bombermans ist es, alle Gegner durch geschicktes platzieren von Bomben zu eliminieren. Durch aufsammeln von diversen Gegenständen können spezielle Fähigkeiten der Spielfiguren verbessert und somit die Chancen auf den Sieg vergrößert werden.

GlobalFunction.name: bombermanColorName
GlobalFunction.documentation: Returns the color name of the bomberman
GlobalFunction.Body: var names = ["Black", "White", "Red", "Blue", "Green"]; return names[Global.bombermanNameIndex++%5];

GlobalFunction.name: createLists
GlobalFunction.documentation: Function put the coordinates of the blocks into corresponding arrays. array form: x0, y0, x1, y1, ....

GlobalFunction.name: getNextEntryOfList
GlobalFunction.documentation: Function returns the next element of the list corresponding to the given parameter and increases the corresponding index

GlobalFunction.name: convert
GlobalFunction.documentation: Function converts the user readable map into an internal representation using an enumeration.

GlobalFunction.name: setMapCell
GlobalFunction.documentation: Function sets the given MapCell with the given CellContent value and returns the hole map

GlobalFunction.name: setBombermanMapCell
GlobalFunction.documentation: Function sets the given MapCell with the given CellContent value and returns the hole map (the map for computer controlled )

GlobalFunction.name: markBombAreaOnBombermanMap
GlobalFunction.documentation: Function marks the cells of the bombermanmap which are in range of an bomb. So the computer controlled bomberman know there not to move.

GlobalFunction.name: unMarkBombAreaOnBombermanMap
GlobalFunction.documentation: Funtion unmarks the mark cells of the bombermanmap if the corresponding bombs detonates.

GlobalFunction.name: isBlockOnCoordinates
GlobalFunction.documentation: Checks if the bomberman could move to the given position, e.g. not possible if there is a solid block

GlobalFunction.name: checkIfBombermanInRange
GlobalFunction.documentation: Function checks if a bomberman is in range of an bomb explosion.

GlobalFunction.name: couldBlockBeDestroyed
GlobalFunction.documentation: Function which checks, if a given block could be destroyed by a given bomb

GlobalFunction.name: convertToItem
GlobalFunction.documentation: Converts the given integer into an enumaration of type "item"

GlobalFunction.name: toggleItem
GlobalFunction.documentation: This function is only for animation purposes. Every item toogles between two states. The "normal" and the "_toggle" state. So it is possible to switch the image and animate the item.

GlobalFunction.name: getInitialBombState
GlobalFunction.documentation: This function decides which images for a bomb are shown. The self destroying one or the detonator bomb ones.

GlobalFunction.name: getNextBombState
GlobalFunction.documentation: This function is only for animation purposes. It changes the state of the ticking bomb, so it is possible to use different images.

GlobalFunction.name: searchSaveSpot
GlobalFunction.documentation: This function searches recursive an save spot from the given spot.

GlobalFunction.name: lookForSaveSpotAround
GlobalFunction.documentation: The function "look" if there is an save spot directly around the given spot. if not "null" will be returned.

GlobalFunction.name: chooseTarget
GlobalFunction.documentation: The function calculates an target for the copmuter controlled bomberman. Actual it only chooses the position of the bomberman with id = 1.

GlobalFunction.name: checkIfEnemyAround
GlobalFunction.documentation: This function checks if there is an enemy around the given bomberman.

GlobalFunction.name: isDestroyableBlockAround
GlobalFunction.documentation: Functions checks if there is an destroyable block around the given position.

GlobalFunction.name: mainAi
GlobalFunction.documentation: Function for the computer controlled bombermans intelligence.

GlobalFunction.name: updateWins
GlobalFunction.documentation: Updates the wins of all bombermans. Works as follows: There is a global Array named "bombermanWins" which is updated if only one bomberman is alive. For the user it would be nice to see, how many times a bomberman has won, so the score should be printed. But it is not possible to print with an CDATA construct, so the array is splittet in 5 global variables.

GlobalFunction.name: calcRandomItem
GlobalFunction.documentation: Function to distribute items with different probability.
GlobalFunction.Body:
var value = parseInt( Math.random() * 100);
if (value < 30) return (0); // no item with probability 0.3 if (value < 60) return (1); // bomb item with probability 0.3 if (value < 90) return (2); // fire item with probability 0.3 return (3); // detonator item with probability 0.1

Function.name: calcNextMove
Function.documentation: Function calculates the direction of the Bomberman (only for animation)

ReactionRule.documentation: ReactionRule moves the computer controlled Bomberman

ActionRule.name: MoveLeft_ActionRule
ActionRule.documentation: ActionRule to move the Bomberman in Direction LEFT (only for animation) and scedules the moveBomberman Event

ActionRule.name: MoveUp_ActionRule
ActionRule.documentation: ActionRule to move the Bomberman in Direction UP (only for animation) and scedules the moveBomberman Event

ActionRule.name: MoveRight_ActionRule
ActionRule.documentation: ActionRule to move the Bomberman in Direction RIGHT (only for animation) and scedules the moveBomberman Event

ActionRule.name: MoveDown_ActionRule
ActionRule.documentation: ActionRule to move the Bomberman in Direction DOWN (only for animation) and scedules the moveBomberman Event

ActionRule.name: PlantBomb_ActionRule
ActionRule.documentation: ActionRule to schedule the PlantBomb Event to plant the Bomb of the player

ActionRule.name: Detonator_ActionRule

EnvironmentRule.name: MoveBomberman_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Rule reacts on moveEvent of every bomberman. Checks also if move is possible.

EnvironmentRule.name: PlantBomb_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Rule reacts on planEvent and places the bomb in the Global.GameMap and creates an object of type Bomb

EnvironmentRule.name: BombState_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Rule has only visualisation purposes. Bomb is pumping up and down -> image toggle

EnvironmentRule.name: ItemToggle_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Rule to toggle the item pictures. Depents on the itemstate.

EnvironmentRule.name: DecreaseBombTimers_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Rule is executed in every simulation step and decreases the bomb timer of all bombs by 1 exactly till 0

EnvironmentRule.name: DetonateBombs_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Rule to detonate bombs (schedule destroyBomb Event) of given bomberman

EnvironmentRule.name: CheckIfBombermanGetsKilled_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Rule checks if a Bomberman gets killed by the bomb

FOR-ObjectVariable.SelectionCondition: (this.bomberman.getX() === this.exBo.getX() && this.bomberman.getY() === this.exBo.getY()) || Global.checkIfBombermanInRange(this.bomberman.getX(), this.bomberman.getY(), this.exBo.getX(), this.exBo.getY(), this.exBo.getRange())

EnvironmentRule.name: CheckIfBlockGetsDestroyed_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Rule checks if a block gets destroyed by the bomb

EnvironmentRule.name: CheckIfItemGetsDestroyed_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Rule checks if an item gets destroyed by the bomb.

EnvironmentRule.name: CheckIfBombGetsDestroyed_Rule

EnvironmentRule.documentation: Rule checks if the bomberman collects a bombitem.

FOR-ObjectVariable.SelectionCondition: this.item.getX() === this.bomberman.getX() && this.item.getY() === this.bomberman.getY() && (this.item.getKind() === Items.BOMB || this.item.getKind() === Items.BOMB_TOGGLE)

EnvironmentRule.documentation: Rule checks if the bomberman collects a fireitem.

FOR-ObjectVariable.SelectionCondition: this.item.getX() === this.bomberman.getX() && this.item.getY() === this.bomberman.getY() && (this.item.getKind() === Items.FIRE || this.item.getKind() === Items.FIRE_TOGGLE)

EnvironmentRule.name: CheckBombermanFoundDetonatorItem_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Rule checks if the bomberman collects a detonatoritem.

FOR-ObjectVariable.SelectionCondition: this.item.getX() === this.bomberman.getX() && this.item.getY() === this.bomberman.getY() && (this.item.getKind() === Items.DETONATOR || this.item.getKind() === Items.DETONATOR_TOGGLE)

EnvironmentRule.name: DestroyBlock_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Destroys the given block and also creates an item.

EnvironmentRule.name: DestroyBomb_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Destroys the given bomb. Also the animation for the explosion is created, but only if the game will not be restartet.

EnvironmentRule.name: IncreaseBombNumberOfBombs_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Increases the number of bombs for the corresponding bomberman.

EnvironmentRule.name: DestroyItem_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Destroys the item and actualize the map.

EnvironmentRule.name: KillBomberman_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Kills the bomberman.

EnvironmentRule.name: ResetGame_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Reset the game by destroying all bombs.

EnvironmentRule.name: ResetGame2_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Reset the game by destroying all items.

EnvironmentRule.name: ResetGame3_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Reset the game by destroying all destroyable blocks.

EnvironmentRule.name: ResetGame4_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Last bomberman gets killed and his global win stats get updated.

EnvironmentRule.name: ResetGame5_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Winning Sound if player wins.

EnvironmentRule.name: ResetGame6_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: If anyone wins 5 rounds the game/simulation stops. Otherwise all obstacles and players are reseted and a new round begins.

EnvironmentRule.name: AnimateExplosionCentral_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Changes the state of the central explosion and also destroys the object if animation ends.

EnvironmentRule.name: DestroyExplosionCentral_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Animation for bombexplosion.

EnvironmentRule.name: AnimateBurningBrick_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Changes the state of the brick destruction and also destroys the object if animation ends.

EnvironmentRule.name: DestroyBurningBrick_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Burns the destroyable block down.

EnvironmentRule.name: CreateItem_Rule
EnvironmentRule.documentation: Creates an item if one should.

div.p: You play the role of the BLACK bomberman. Later maybe other!
These are the possible actions you can do:

ul.li:
Move the Bomberman:
left: '←' or 'A' keys
right: '→' or 'D' keys
up: '↑' or 'W' keys
down: '↓' or 'S' keys
Kill all other Bomberman to win a round. Win 5 times to win the game!
Avoid getting hit by a Bomb and don't forget to collect items!
